title: Identity resolution module
description: Service name normalization and resolution across providers. Features: normalize service names (remove env suffixes, version suffixes, type prefixes), match aliases and external IDs, fuzzy matching with configurable threshold (0.85 default), TTL cache for resolution results. Files: src/nthlayer/identity/__init__.py, models.py, normalizer.py, resolver.py. Tests: tests/test_identity.py (32 tests).
